reviews.review_msg: Dr. Healey was great for Contemporary Crim Theory. He was very honest in what he expected of students and also displayed that he's willing to work with you if you don't understand. He was very straight forward in what was going to be on exams, even giving us the questions days beforehand. Really enjoyed his class!

I've had Jay twice now, for Sexual Offences and Offenders and Contemporary Crim Theory. He is very knowledgeable and passionate about the material he lectures on. He encourages discussion and participation so it's good to be engaged and having the readings done is a must. He keeps things interesting and has a good sense of humor. Definitely recommd
